description.narrative:
Stakeholder Impact: The Project is expected to increase access to quality digital connectivity and data center capacity for individuals and businesses.
Competitiveness: The Project will support increased competitiveness for mobile connectivity or data hosting services in the target countries, via competition channels.

The proposed investment consists of an up to US$100 million equity investment in diversified digital infrastructure (DI) assets advised by DCP Fund Adviser, LLC (the Fund Manager). IFCs investment considers an indirect equity interest in: (i) Scala Data Centers S.A. (Scala), a hyperscale data center operator in Brazil, (ii) Edgepoint HoldCo Pte Ltd (Edgepoint), a tower operator in Indonesia and Malaysia, (iii) Highline do Brasil II Infraestrutura de Telecomunicações S.A. (Highline), a tower company in Brazil, and (iv) an investment in DI assets in emerging markets either through (A) a blind pool investment vehicle investing alongside one of the Fund Managers existing investment funds (the SideCar) or (B) another managed co-investment (together with Scala, Edgepoint and Highline, the Project).
